name: Sabatweet
body:
# SabaTweet is a new Twitter client

SabaTweet is a Twitter client for heavy users and for ofcourse beginners.
any annoying advertisement is not displayed.

It have been developped on the solid back end includes RDBMS and the WPF technology,
so we add any features

## downloads
It is under development quickly. Please wait for a while. 

## system requirements
* >= Windows XP (but I recommend you to Windows7)

## support & contact
SabaTweet is developped by [team-scomber](https://github.com/Team-Scomber/sabatweet)

### consributors
* @chrysanthpond
* @eldesh
